actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Water and Power.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department, OMB.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to take corrective action to protect certain portions of the Franklin County, Washington, road system within the Federal Columbia Basin reclamation project.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to investigate and design any works necessary to protect the road system in irrigated portions of Franklin County, Washington, within the Federal Columbia Basin reclamation project and which are underlain or adjacent to lands identified as the Ringold Formation.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to take corrective action to protect certain portions of the Franklin County, Washington, road system within the Federal Columbia Basin reclamation project.
